class TestClass {
  static const String staticField = 'staticField';
  static const _TestClassStaticClassField staticClassField = _TestClassStaticClassField();
}

class _TestClassStaticClassField {
  const _TestClassStaticClassField();

  final String subClassField = 'staticClassField.subClassField';
  final __TestClassStaticClassFieldSubClassClassField subClassClassField = const __TestClassStaticClassFieldSubClassClassField();
}

class __TestClassStaticClassFieldSubClassClassField {
  const __TestClassStaticClassFieldSubClassClassField();

  final String lastField = 'staticClassField.subClassClassField.lastField';
}
